title: Associate, Securities & Fiduciary Services Operations
description: Business Function - Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capabilityand innovation. In Group T&O, we managethe majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. Key Accountabilities Timeliness. To ensure that all Corporate Announcements & processing are done within 24 hours of receipt of announcements or proceeds. Accuracy. To ensure at least 99% accuracy Responsive.To ensure that all clients queries are responded to within 24 hours of receipt of query or if not to provide interim reply and to follow with a response within 3 days. Risk. To ensure that there are no critical audit findings / issues and to escalate any immediate and time critical issues to higher authorities. People. To participate in staff surveys, attend training when nominated and be crossed trained in other areas of work within the section or across sections in order to become a well-trained leave cover. To be a good team player. Responsibilities Check and ensure that all corporate action events are processed correctly and promptly. Ensure prompt notification to clients on voluntary corporate action events such as rights, dividend with options, expiry of warrants, redemption, etc. Check that clients instructions are executed accordingly. Ensure that clients entitlements are protected. Handle clients enquiries and provide timely responses. Maintain high standard of service quality. Perform a dual maker/checker role. Requirements Degree holder with minimum 2-5years working experience in Corporate Actions. Knowledge of SWIFT. Proficient in Microsoft. Responsive, detailed and strive for accuracy. Good communication skills and a good team player

title: SVP, Financial Planning, Analysis & Performance Management, Regional Bancassurance, Consumer Banking Group
description: Business Function. As the leading bank in Asia, DBS Consumer Banking Group is in a unique position to help our customers realise their dreams and ambitions. As a market leader in the consumer banking business, DBS has a full spectrum of products and services, including deposits, investments, insurance, mortgages, credit cards and personal loans, to help our customers realise their dreams and aspirations at every life stage. Our financial solutions are not only the best in the business. they were made just right for you. Insurance is a key customer need and an important revenue driver for DBS. DBS is a top provider of this need in Singapore & in other countries. In order to continue to lead in this space, DBS will need to constantly innovate, evaluate, and execute in order to stay ahead of our competitors. This role will help DBS analyze and report on revenue drivers related to the Bancassurance business, drive prioritization initiatives as well as highlight financial risks. Responsibilities Analyze and provide insights on Regional Bancassurance results & business drivers. Drive annual Banca business planning, periodic forecast and report against plans. Build out & implement a data driven approach to business decisions and prioritization. Work with insurance partners and across multiple departments to build data sources for detailed partnership analysis. Develop and monitor data quality metrics and ensure business data and reporting needs are met. Evaluate current strategies, propose & drive initiatives to improve bancassurance business. Highlight financial opportunities and risks across the business. Conduct market analyses for insights and trends. Facilitate best practice sharing forums to share best practices across countries. Support insurance partnership & distribution strategy assessment. Develop and present comprehensive presentation material for senior management. Lead the implementation of strategic initiatives and obtain support from multiple stakeholders and strategic insurance partners. Other Ad hoc strategic initiatives. Requirements 8-15 years of experience in or supporting financial services. Experience with financial reporting, systems, project management, planning and business analytics in banking/insurance industry preferred. Insurance product knowledge is preferred. (1) Core competencies Have a get things done mentality; a self-starter who can dissect problem, identify solutions, and drive solutions to completion. Adaptable, analytical thinker who can work both strategically as well as in a hands-on/executional capacity. Intellectual curiosity a must. Impeccable communication skills (written & verbal) including strong presentation skills. Excellent stakeholder management and influencing skills. Demonstrating clarity of thought and ability to form strong relationships with stakeholders. Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to juggle multiple tasks and handle competing priorities. Good banking & insurance product and system knowledge will be a plus. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Attention to detail. (2) Technical competencies Analytical and inclination for problem-solving. Advanced presentation and Excel skills, ability to analyze large datasets. Experience with SQL, Python, Java, C++, Qlikview BI tools will be advantageous. Project management.

title: AVP, Site Reliability Engineer, Consumer Banking Group Technology,Technology & Operations
description: Business Function Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. Responsibilities Facilitate/Drive recovery calls for major incidents and coordinate with multiple teams to drive the resolution. Responsible to communicate on major incidents and provide regular update to the stakeholders. Ensure Preventive and detective measures of the applications are identified and implemented. Automation of manual activities/processes for Production teams (automation experience required). Identifies persistent or recurring problems and recommends creative solutions. Great people skills to build and manage performing team. Strong communications skills and collaborate well within global team, ensures proper handoff of incidents and details. Ensure incidents are escalated and facilitated to enable efficient and timely service restorations. Drives Root Cause Analysis with technology partners, post incident resolution and facilitates RCA reviews. Manages the identification and development of monitoring and improvements (process/systemic) to improve the reliability of Production systems. Implements SRE practices in CORE Banking. Automate processes and remove Toils. Build automation and Observability tools to detect, troubleshoot and recover systems faster and improve Production systems reliability and resiliency. Build predictive tools and solutions using Machine Learning capabilities. Make best use of available logs and instrumentation. Requirements. Minimum 12 years of experience and out of which minimum 7+ years of Production Management experience preferably in Banking industry. Managed Open Systems (eco systems) and multi-countries production environment. Good level of command over production Infra; performance monitoring and reporting tools. SRE - Implement Site Reliability Engineering principles regarding performance, reliability, monitoring, alerting in Production environment. Over 7+ years of experience in Incident Management, Change Management, Problem Management. Hands-on experience in Unix/Linux/Shell/Python scripting. Familiar with applications Xcelerate/TBMS systems, Quadient or equivalent statement generation engines, Jboss , MariaDB, EDB Postgres, Java (in Linux operating system), Kafka. Experience in supporting critical applications using API driven cloud native technologies (e.g: AWS, PCF, OpenShift, or Kubernetes). Good knowledge in Java & Spring boot and Python. Good working experience in Elasticsearch, Logstash, Grafana/Kibana, Appdynamics etc. Production automation. Automation of manual activities/processes for Production teams (automation experience required). Good knowledge of Machine Learning Algorithms like Regression, Classification, Decision Tree, Random Forest, Bagging & Boosting Techniques like XGBoost. Good Communication skill, Positive work attitude and self-motivated can work independently as well as in a team. Good experience in running automation and improvements experience.

title: Teller
description: How it works. You do not need experience to start strong. After 4-weeks in-depth training, you will have a solid grasp of our range of branch banking services and processes. Based at one of our 32 island-wide branches, you will shape the customerâ€™s experiences, address their concerns, and provide solutions. Your journey with us does not stop here potential opportunities await. After proving yourself, move into roles such as a Service Manager, Digital Ambassador or even Customer Service Manager. What you do. You will be an expert at our over-the-counter services and transactions: cash management, account opening and closure, balancing of cash, cheques, and remittance handling. You will process customer transaction accurately and efficiently. Assist customers and providing guidance to them to resolve any banking-related issues in a timely and professional manner. You proactively recommend self-service and automated banking channel services to the customers to ensure our counters attend to the more complex queries. You keep our customers safe by looking out for any suspicious transactions and reporting it to relevant parties and performing our banking activities in accordance with regulatory requirements. Who you are. You are a motivated individual with a passion for customer service and a desire to grow your career in the banking industry: Preferably 1-2 years experience in customer service. Excellence interpersonal, communication and listening skills in English and another language. Local dialect would be advantageous as you interact with customers from all walks of life. Ability to demonstrate care and empathy in understanding the customers needs and going the extra mile to help. Ability to handle difficult customers tactfully and defuse hostility, and exercise judgement to escalate cases to relevant parties if required. Detailed oriented and meticulous. Digital literacy including proficiency with online banking, mobile banking and other digital banking tools. Proficient in Microsoft Office suite such as words and excel. Ability to multi-task and manage time effectively. Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.

title: VP / ED Senior Developer (Mobile), Team Lead
description: Description - External. As an engineer Lead in OCBC, you will be leading multiple teams, building applications that work at scale to support various banking products, services, and also enable development workflows. We are looking for a full-stack developer lead who can build APIs, front-ends, back-ends, and tools that interact with other bank services. You will be part of every stage of development, from concept to deployment. If you're passionate about the fintech, want to be part of a group that works on new products, have the opportunity to shape them, and enjoy crafting robust, scalable, and maintainable services, we may be the team for you! Description: Develop and maintain highly reliable and scalable services and applications. Create automation that works on Windows, macOS and Linux servers. Build APIs and UIs that are simple and powerful. Understand product requirements, engage with team members and customers to define solutions, and estimate the scope of work required. Collaborate with, mentor, and influence members within your team and across other teams in OCBC. Deliver solutions that can keep up with a rapidly evolving product in a timely fashion. Qualifications. Solid Java development experience. Experience with at least one other programming language (C#, Kotlin, Golang). Knowledge in Microservices, Functions, Event-driven/reactive programming or other Cloud Native architectures. Experience designing, building, and maintaining RESTful APIs.Experience with Cloud Native Platforms including Kubernetes, Open Shift, Docker Enterprise, or Cloud Foundry in the public cloud. Experience with JavaScript and one or more front-end frameworks such as React or AngularJS. Mobile app development experience is preferred Expertise in building highly available production services, including deployment automation, infrastructure-as-code, monitoring, and scaling. Good understanding of containers, build systems, and infrastructure automation.Experience with DevOps and Agile engineering practices

title: (AVP / VP) Valuation Control Senior Analyst
description: Job Description: The Valuation Control (VC) team is part of the Treasury Financial Control & Advisory department (TFCA), which falls under the Group Finance Division in the Bank. The VC team is an independent control unit who looks after the valuation of financial instruments and applies valuation adjustments when there are valuation deficiencies. The successful candidate will be joining the VC team mainly to identify, formulate and implement new valuation adjustments methodologies to support new businesses and new products. The individual will work closely with Front Office, Market Risk and Product Control teams on valuation, model and market data related issues. Key Responsibilities. Identify potential valuation issues in new product approval process and recommend valuation adjustments where appropriate. Formulate and implement new valuation adjustments methodologies. Perform independent price testing. Calculate monthly valuation adjustments to ensure that financial instruments are correctly fair valued in accordance with applicable accounting standards and regulatory requirements. Participate in system testing and regulatory driven initiatives such as CVA. Work closely with product controllers, market risk department and front office to identify and resolve valuation related issues. Qualifications - External. Requirements University degree in finance, mathematics or other engineering disciplines is preferred. Strong financial product knowledge. Good understanding of common valuation techniques, market data inputs and pricing models. Team player. Able to manage time and work priorities.

title: Executive / Senior Executive, Group Compliance
description: Responsibilities. Assist in the execution and administration of regulatory compliance monitoring program. Keep abreast of regulatory changes and industry practices and support the assessment of the potential commercial and/or operational impact. Disseminate, review and advise on consultation papers and new/revised regulations, including collating feedback from relevant stakeholders. Assist in formulating and tailor compliance policies and procedures to align with new business / operational needs, regulatory developments and/or industry practice. Review completed compliance assessment return and prepare periodic compliance related reporting documents. Assist in the delivery of the compliance related training programmes. Interact with auditors on regulatory compliance matters. Assist in cooperation with and responding to regulatory inquiries, surveys, consultations and examinations. This may include coordination with various internal business partners and other stakeholders. Requirements. Bachelor Degree in Accountancy, Finance, Business or related discipline. At least 2 years of relevant working experience in asset management industry or international public accounting firm or outsourced accounting services industry with experience specialising in funds/financial services industry. Strong attention to detail. Possesses strong analytical skills, problem solving skills and excellent communication skills. Resourceful, hands-on and committed to deliver results. Able to prioritize and respond well to changing circumstances and tight timelines. An independently minded person who thrives in a team-based environment. Benefits - Flexible benefits with comprehensive medical coverage for self and family. Training and development opportunities Subsidised rates at Ascott serviced residences. Strong advocate of staff volunteerism. Wellness programmes

title: Executive / Senior Executive, Finance Shared Services - AR (1-year contract)
description: Responsibilities. Review and approve billing requests and billing cancellations, lease billing and accounting, generate credit /debit notes and manage Accounts Receivable invoice disputes. Review and finalise period end closing activities and communicate with other teams. Review intercompany transactions. Escalate issues to supervisor to avoid delays in processing. Review and approve processing of all modes of collections, refunds, debtors' reconciliations and confirmations. Review and finalise Accounts Receivable aging report Review and approve closing and reconciliation processes and audit schedules related to Accounts Receivable. Review intercompany settlements Attend to ad hoc customer queries on invoices. Participate in any other tasks/projects as assigned. Requirements. Degree in Accountancy or ACCA or equivalent. At least 5 years of relevant working experience in computerised accounting environment (supervisory/reviewing experience is an advantage). Knowledge of Microsoft Excel and SAP Integrity and accounting professionalism. A resourceful, analytical and self-motivated mindset. Benefits. Comprehensive medical coverage for self. Training and development opportunities. Subsidised rates at Ascott serviced residences. Strong advocate of staff volunteerism. Wellness programmes

title: Executive / Senior Executive, IT Audit
description: Job Description. As part of a team who contributes to the ongoing effectiveness of the Group, you will conduct operational and IT audit of the companies within the Group. These include process documentation, risk identification and assessment, evaluation of the adequacy and effectiveness of internal controls and ensuring compliance with established Group policies and procedures. You will be asked to interpret audit results, develop value-adding recommendations to mitigate the risks and prepare audit reports. You will also research into new audit techniques and contribute to continuing plans to enhance the effectiveness of internal controls in the Group. Requirements. Degree in Information Systems/ Data Science/ Engineering or equivalent professional qualification.CIA / CISA/ CISM relevant certification in the discipline will be an added advantage Exposure to hospitality, residential, commercial, business parks, urban developments or retail business audits is preferred. At least 2 years of audit experience in a large organization or an international public accounting firm (Candidates with more than 4 years of relevant internal audit experience may be considered for the Senior Executive role). Candidates with experience in other disciplines (e.g. engineering, data, legal) with relevant finance/quality/audit background and with the right attitude are welcomed to apply. Effective self-starter who excels in a lean and fast-paced organization. Innovative spirit, strong problem-solving aptitude and analytical skills. Good knowledge and understanding of corporate governance, regulatory compliance and familiarity with organizational best practices. Proficiency in Python, SQL and data analytics related coding experience will be an added advantage. Proficiency in written and spoken Mandarin (to communicate with our China offices). Knowledge of other languages will be an added advantage. Willing to travel overseas for work. Benefits.Flexible benefits with comprehensive medical coverage for self. Training and development opportunities Subsidised rates at Ascott serviced residences.Strong advocate of staff volunteerism. Wellness programmes

title: Senior Executive (Food Research & Development)
description: JOB RESPONSIBILITIES. Assist Team Lead in any activities related to product analysis, product / process / packaging development and regulatory requirements. Work with research team, counter parts, traders, cross functional teams, suppliers, laboratories or factories on new product / packaging development for international markets from conceptualization, performs tests on food ingredients and product prototypes, to industrialisation. This includes literature search, market research, selection of ingredients, formulation, costing, process and packaging development, analytical testing for compliance. Able to work independently in a food science laboratory and possesses analytical and problem-solving skills. Ensure all product creations comply with customer, government and legal regulatory requirements within the country of use. Ensure timely documentations of formulae, product and packaging specifications, sensory evaluation, nutritional information and any other document related to product / packaging development. Extend the application of the product(s) developed through recipes creation and sensory evaluation. Send newly developed products for nutritional, microbiological analysis and other necessary tests such as gluten, aflatoxin, GMO, Sudan Red, 3-MCPD, etc to meet specific market requirements. Support Sales / Marketing / Business Unit / Management in Trade events / exhibitions / product presentation and market study by preparing recipes and products. Provide training and technical support to Sales / Marketing / Business Unit in new product development and new product launches. Any other duties or ad hoc projects as assigned by direct supervisor. JOB REQUIREMENTS. Bachelor degree in Food Science / Food Technology or equivalent. At least 5 years of relevant RnD working experience in rice, shelf stable spice paste / sauce and condiments. Knowledge in HACCP, GMP and other food safety regulations are required. Knowledge and experience in retort processing would be an advantage. Proven track record on product innovation and commercialization with an in-depth knowledge for conceptualization to technology transfer in the production scale.Good knowledge of additives is required. Good interpersonal skills, work ethic, creative, meticulous, flexible and positive thinking. A good team player who has passion in food and health. Ability to handle multiple projects and work independently. Must be proficient in Microsoft Office.

title: Assistant Research Officer
description: Job Responsibilities: Perform enzymatic assays to evaluate the enzyme activity. Performing routine molecular cloning, PCR, plasmid construction. Evaluate the use of enzymes in food or production of oleochemicals Active discussion on the project work Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree?in Biochemistry, Bioengineering, Biological Sciences or other related fields. Prefer to have 1-2 year experience in Molecular biology or protein engineering work. Good communication skills and a team player. Ability to work independently

title: Senior Business System Analyst
description: Provide on-going SAP application technical and functional support primarily in areas of MM and SD. Perform detail systems analysis and provides solutions for system improvements. Able to work with all aspects of SAP RICEF and is expected to help with queries relating to daily operational transactions, reports, interfaces, enhancements, ALE/iDoc, Conversions, forms, Web DynPro etc Work well with team members in areas of SAP application maintenance as well as IT projects. Ensure all developments are audit and security complaint in accordance to IT policies and guidelines. Analyse business information and work independently from requirement gathering workshops to UAT and deployment to production. Design and develop integration solutions for data exchanges with other IT applications across various regions. Communicate and work closely with key business stakeholders on systems and process improvements.

title: Lead Software Engineer
description: As a Lead Engineer across our data platform teams, you would be responsible for designing, implementing, rolling out, and evangelizing the next generation of streaming, stream processing, and segmentation platforms at Grab. The Day-to-Day Activities. Own data platforms that are built to meet functional and non-functional requirements of our engineering customers and the business. Design and build APIs, interfaces, and database schemas to ensure scalability, maintainability, and performance across the realtime data services domain. Design, implement, instrument, and deploy highly available services with tight SLAs, and champion for operational excellence across initiatives. Lead Collaboration with stakeholders across teams and roles, to identify and resolve ambiguous, multi dimensional business, legal, and product needs to ensure data platform architectures are not just performant and usable, but also compliant. Work with the engineering team to explore and create new design / architectures geared towards scale and performance. Mentor junior engineers. Participate in interview loops to help Grab continue hiring top industry talent.The Must-Haves. A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology or related fields. 7+ years of experience in software engineering in a distributed systems environment. Prior experience designing, implementing, and deploying large scale data intensive architectures to production. Strong Computer Science fundamentals in algorithms and data structures Knowledge and expertise in distributed systems design and internals. Possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills, able to think critically of the current system in terms of growth and stability.You can be a good coder in any language (C++, C, Java, Scala, Rust, Haskell, OCaml, Erlang, Python, Ruby, PHP, Node.JS, C# etc.), but willing to work on Golang. Experience with any / all of Kafka, Flink, Kubernetes, Spark, ScyllaDB, and / or managed cloud services (specifically, AWS and Azure) is a strong plus.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description: Get to know the Role. Data Engineers in Grab get to work on one of the largest and fastest growing datasets of any company in South East Asia. We operate in a challenging, fast paced and ever changing environment that will push you to grow and learn. You will be involved in various areas of Grab Data Ecosystem including reporting & analytics, data infrastructure, and various other data services that are integral parts of Grab overall technical stack. The Day-to-Day Activities. Build, deploy and manage big data tools with solid devops functions. Be able to manage.CI/CD pipelines and terraform as well as cloud infrastructure. Deep understanding of the different data formats and table formats in distributed data processing and data storage: Data Formats: Parquet, Avro, ORC, Arrow. Open Table Formats: Delta Lake, Iceberg, Hudi and Hive. Streamline data access and security to enable data scientists, analysts and backend engineers to easily access data whenever they need to. Developing automation framework using programming languages such as python and automate the big data workflows such as ingestion, aggregation, ETL processing etc. Maintain and optimize the performance of our data analytics infrastructure to ensure accurate, reliable and timely delivery of key insights for decision making. Run Modern high performance analytical databases, with Solid understanding of distributed computing, and be able to build out scalable and reliable ETL pipelines and processes to ingest data from a large number and variety of data sources with high performance analytical databases and computation engines like Spark, Flink, Presto, Synapse, BigQuery, Greenplum and others. Understand most of SQL interface to tabular, relational datasets. Some distributed analytic engines like Trino(formerly Presto), Druid, Clickhouse, Redshift, Snowflake, Synapse, BigQuery, Greenplum (and other tools commonly referred to as data warehouses) integrate proprietary storage services with the analytics engine, creating self-contained data lakes functionality. The Must-Haves. A degree or higher in Computer Science, Electronics or Electrical Engineering, Software Engineering, Information Technology or other related technical disciplines. Designed high performance scalable infrastructure stacks for Big Data Analytics. Write unit, functional and end-to-end tests. Real passion for data, new data technologies, and discovering new and interesting solutions to the company data needs. Excellent communication skills to communicate with the product development engineers to coordinate development of data pipelines, and or any new products features that can be built on top of the results of data analysis. The Nice-to-Haves.Experience in handling large data sets (multiple PBs) and working with structured, unstructured and geographical datasets. Good experience in handling big data within a distributed system and knowledge of SQL in distributed OLAP environments. Knowledgeable on cloud systems like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform. Familiar with tools within the Hadoop ecosystem, especially Presto and Spark. Good experience with programming languages like Python, Go, Scala, Java, or scripting languages like Bash. Design and implement RESTful APIs, and build, deploy performant modern web applications in React, NodeJS and TypeScript. Deep understanding on databases and best engineering practices - include handling and logging errors, monitoring the system, building human-fault-tolerant pipelines, understanding how to scale up, addressing continuous integration, knowledge of database administration, maintaining data cleaning and ensuring a deterministic pipeline.

title: Senior Business Analyst, Salesforce Delivery
description: Get to know the Role. This role plays a critical role of a Salesforce Senior Business Analyst with an exciting journey to enhance our Salesforce platform and improve adoption. The candidate will need a strong techno-functional background in Salesforce (out-of-the-box standard functionality and custom solutions) with proven hands-on experience in Service Cloud, Sales Cloud and Community Cloud modules.The Day-to-Day Activities. A self-starter; with the ability to identify and pursue opportunities without being provided explicit direction. Translates business strategy into technical requirements and IT solutions by developing a deep understanding of the customer and product needs. Shares the product vision and works closely with the Business Owner, Scrum Master to ensure the team delivers value to the business. Demonstrates ability to influence business unit leads to meet project objectives. With agile delivery experience, leading business and functional requirements definition, prioritization/scoping of requirements, perform functional testing on the deliverables. Engage with business stakeholders, gather requirements using various methods such as interviews, workshops, business processes, use cases, wireframes and business workflow analysis, and map them to solutions that leverage Salesforce functionality. Craft business requirement documents, process level, flows, user stories, functional specifications and system design specifications. Ensures traceability between requirements to Features to user stories. Play a critical role in managing the product backlog. Work with the business to understand and prioritize needs while proactively suggesting future enhancements, improvements and drive adoption. Ability to conduct UAT training, create UAT test scripts and run end to end UAT and SIT sessions with cross-team stakeholders in system testing of new functionality or bug fixes. Strong experience in client facing roles and managing stakeholder expectations with good problem solving, analytical skills and good Story-telling skills. Strong knowledge of Salesforce Product features (Sales and Service cloud) and ability to configure and run POC demos with the business. Strong understanding and hands-on experience of Salesforce Out of the box features (Flows, Security model, Shield Encryption, Process Automation, Handling Large Data Migrations, SOQL/SOSL, Reports, Dashboards, Data models and strong configuration), customization skills. Ability to Identify opportunities to leverage the platform in addressing emerging business needs, solving business problems while providing guidance to developers while solutioning. Collaborate with developers on technical architecture and bring deep domain expertise to the team. Ability to identify bottleneck issues in systems/designs and propose appropriate and innovative solutions. Proven experience in implementing large scale Integrations - web services and good understanding of Authentication mechanisms and deployment processes. Excellent verbal and written communication skills, excellent presentation skills, Ability to communicate effectively with different levels within the organization and collaborate with cross-functional business partners and technical teams. Certifications: Certified Salesforce Administrator, Certified Salesforce Advance Administrator, Sales Cloud Certified, Service Cloud Certified, Salesforce Business Analyst. The Must-Haves. Must have at least 6 years of business analysis experience in Salesforce platform. Strong knowledge and experience with configuration (Flows, Security Model, Shield Encryption, Process Automation, Handling Large Data Migrations, SOQL/SOSL, Reports, Dashboards,Data Models, Omni-channel, Out of the box capabilities etc), customization, Implementing Integrations of Salesforce platform, Shield Platform, Lightning Aura/LWC frameworks, Communities, Security aspects of Salesforce applications. Strong business analysis experience in the Salesforce platform. Good understanding of CI/CD platforms like Gitlab, Copado,Jenkins, Ant tool etc.Excellent troubleshooting experience and problem solving with Salesforce ( Lightning components, Flows / Processes, Lightning page performance, SOQL performance, API integrations and so on). Strong business acumen and lead the solution discussions & presentations with business stakeholders and project team. Knowledge of Agile and Scrum Framework. The Nice-to-Haves. Salesforce Certified CPQ Specialist will be an added advantage. Experience working with Marketing Cloud, Pardot and AppExchange (Conga, Adobe Sign).

title: Revenue Assurance Specialist
description: Job Description. Review processes, systems, projects relevant to the various revenue streams to evaluate the effectiveness of internal controls with the aim of minimising possible revenue and cost leakage. Understand the entire digital landscape including migration from old stacks to new stacks for various business lines and new digital initiatives driven by the organisation to perform a risk-based-impact assessment and recommend audit coverage for future. Analyse key spends related to revenue-growth-management (eg: promotions, free of cost services etc), identify gaps/wastages (if any) and recommend underlying processes and controls to enhance maturity Advise management with outside-in perspectives on best practices /SOPs/operating models in telecom sector across business lines to support the controls maturity journey in the light of business transformation (B2C, Enterprise consumers, B2B etc). Actively work with the analytics coder to provide business /audit insights to develop, test, rectify and refine analytics on-ground (backend scripts and front-end visualisation) and deploy it on audit engagements to enhance coverage, depth, outcomes and efficiencies in the longer-term. Suggest and partner with the business to enable them to develop the appropriate framework and processes on automated tracking and monitoring of revenue assurance-related issues. Develop and suggest key levers to be included in the roadmap to improve revenue assurance maturity across existing and future business lines to ensure all revenue streams are covered. Define and drive the strategy to detect fraudulent activities Act as a team lead during audit engagements, ensuring that audit project are managed and coordinated effectively. Support the GIA function in various audit and advisory projects beyond Revenue Assurance/telecom sectors, when needed. Job Requirements. Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience in revenue assurance ideally in the telecommunication sector. Possess good business acumen and have an inquiring mind. Meticulous, highly analytical, process-driven self-starter with the ability to work independently and as a team member. Good interpersonal skills, able to work in diverse environment and build good working relationships with business counterparts. Good report-writing and communication skills. Overseas travelling will be required.

title: Deputy Manager, Investor Relations & Sustainability
description: Job Description. Work alongside Keppel Capital listed REITs and Trust and private equity funds to develop and execute ESG strategy and initiatives that are aligned with Keppel Group. Prepare ESG updates to stakeholders including board of directors, senior management and key executives. Coordinate with various departments to monitor progress towards achieving ESG goals/targets. Prepare sustainability reports in alignment with global reporting standards. Partner investor relations and client relations teams to prepare ESG-related presentations and materials for the investment community. Keep abreast of sustainability related developments and trends. Perform gap analysis to improve/or participate in ESG ratings/benchmarks/indices. Drive sustainability enhancement initiatives and stakeholder outreach and engagement programmes and efforts. Job Requirements. Degree in related/relevant discipline (e.g. sustainability, environment or social science, accountancy, business) or knowledge of key sustainability standards and frameworks (e.g. GRI, UN SDG, TCFD). Familiarity with ESG benchmarks/indices (e.g. GRESB, CDP, MSCI). Minimum 4 years of relevant working experience Creative self-starter with an outgoing personality, and a team player. Strong research, analytical and writing skills. Good networking and communication skills. Able to multi-task and work well under pressure to meet tight deadlines.

title: Executive, Finance
description: Job Description. The selected individual will be supporting Keppel's Fund Management & Investment Platform. This individual will be stationed at MiWorld in 2023 and will relocate to Keppel Bay Towers in 2024. Assist in the timely closing of accounts and preparation of audit schedules. Assist in preparation of financial schedules, statutory accounts and ensuring quality of accounts meets the agreed service levels. Assist in preparation of month-end journals in accordance with established processes, work procedures and local legal and statutory requirements. Assist in quarterly GST reports preparation, interested/related parties transactions, sponsorship and donation reports. Perform reconciliation of monthly audit schedules, inter-company and bank transactions. Assist in management of fixed assets including disposals and valuations. Handle settlement to fixed assets and maintain fixed asset registers for assigned Companies and Cost Centre groups. Preparation and filing of financial statements in XBRL format. Support external and internal audit, tax reporting and other statutory requirements. Assist to ensure that service is delivered to customers in accordance with pre-defined Service Level Agreements. Liaise and work with Business Unit Finance staff and Finance Shared Service Centre colleagues effectively in delivering service level established. Participate in process improvement projects. Ad-hoc tasks assigned by supervisor. Job Requirements. Diploma in Accounting or Business/Finance. Minimum 2 to 3 years of relevant working experience. Strong accounting knowledge and application of Singapore FRS. Displays positive attitude, team player, meticulous and the ability to multi-task and work under tight timelines. Able to work independently and possess good communication skills. Proficient in MS Office applications. Experience working in finance shared services and knowledge of SAP, BPC and ticketing tools would be advantageous

title: Workshop Executive
description: Job Responsibilities: Support the Workshop Manager in managing the Taxi Maintenance operations and ensure all KPIs are met. Ensure operation costs including but not limited to material, manpower and operating are kept within the operation budget. Review and enhance the existing systems without compromising quality or service while optimizing cost. Manage and ensure smooth day-to-day operations. Produce statistics and reports, to review performance and recommend procedural enhancement for discussion. Establish, implement and monitor safe working practices and procedures. Perform routine safety inspections on equipment and sites to ensure workshop conforms to all health & safety regulations. Job Requirements: Degree/Diploma holder in Mechanical / Electrical / Electronic Engineering discipline or equivalent qualification. Minimum two years experience in operations environment preferably from Automotive Industry. Able to build effective relationship with cross-divisional teams Proven tactfulness in communicating with others and constructively resolve challenges. Excellent interpersonal and communications skills

title: Class 4 Driver
description: Job Description.Perform deliveries. Perform daily check of vehicle to ensure good and safe working condition Ensure all Vehicle Parts are delivered and received in good and proper condition. Job Requirement Familiar with Singapore roads. Good driving records over last 2 years. Minimum Class 4 driving license. Basic knowledge in vehicle conditions. Willing to work half day on every Saturdays.

title: Systems Engineer
description: Job Responsibilities & Duties. Support of systems and applications. Assist on designated departments system eg. respective CMS. Drive/support various infrastructure projects. Ensure updated and good understanding of business needs for identify technological gaps. Propose suitable technological interventions (in terms of applications, integration costs etc.) to ensure that IT business support is up-to-date for business efficiency and effectiveness. Provide end-user helpdesk support for the various systems and applications within the organization to ensure business continuity and smooth operations. Work with application team on the support structure. Technical & Educational Competencies. Possess minimally a Diploma in ICT / Information Technology Preferably 1-3 years of experience or exposure in infrastructure and systems. Experience in Infrastructure, desktops, LAN and Wireless networking, Windows technology, Microsoft 365. Prior exposure and knowledge with cloud platforms (eg. Azure), MS Office VBA, DevOps and Agile will be preferred. Basic understanding of cybersecurity. Possess basic technical knowledge of infrastructure deployments, networking, SDLC model and some programming fundamentals will be bonus (eg. Powershells, batch scripting). Functional Competencies.Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Ability to work well individually as well as in a team setting.

title: Executive - Cybersecurity (Marine)
description: Responsibilities. Ability to administer user account e.g. creating, deleting, or updating user account information, assigning user access rights, resetting passwords. Ability to administration and management of server and its software such as installation, backup, maintenance and troubleshooting. Ability to monitor and tune system performance to improve resource usage, avoid hardware failure and processing bottleneck. Ability to carry out regular security hardening exercise on system by applying application/operating system updates, patches and configuration changes. Ensure the security settings of systems are carried out as per the company security rules. Analyze system/event logs, identify and correct potential issues with the systems. Facilitate development and implementation of new installations, migrations and improvements to the structure and efficiency of company IT network. Familiar with GPO, DNS, DHCP, Firewall, IDS/IPS, Nessus and Endpoints protection. Maintains the project asset inventory lists. Project advisory on IT security and compliance based on company policies and standards. Perform IT security checks and verification. Assist in fronting information security audits. Requirements. At least 2 years of experiences in a cyber security setting. Minimum 2 years of experience in Systems administration. Degree/ Diploma in IT/ Computer Science/ Network/ Computing/ Computing Engineering. Experience VMWare will be an added advantage. Relevant certifications such as Cybersecurity Plus for System Administrator, CompTIA Advanced Security Practitioner (CASP+) and CISSP will be advantageous. Only Singaporean

title: UAV Engineer(Drone)
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Issues Resolution: You will work closely with our customers and provide first line technical support to resolve issues with customers' drone systems. Field work is required. Maintenance and Repair of Drone Systems: You will be responsible to perform maintenance routines on Drone Systems. On-site field work is required. You will diagnose, troubleshoot, and repair Drone Systems. You will also generate maintenance reports and track rectification of issues. Creation and Upkeep of Manuals: You will be responsible to generate and update Maintenance Manuals and User Manuals. You will create preventive maintenance policies and user guidelines based on field experience and customer feedbacks. Requirement. Diploma in Electrical Engineering / Aerospace Engineering / Mechanical Engineering. Good to have 1-2 years of maintenance experience in aviation or drone industry is preferred. No working experience required, on the job training provided. 5 days work, 3 weekdays and 2 weekends.

title: Senior Engineer - Instrument Control & Automation
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Responsibilities. Lead and manage ICA scope of work with the project. Responsible for preparing project documents, developing budgets, meeting client requirements, implementing project procedures, and making sure the project is completed on time and within budget. In addition, you would be responsible for overseeing the design, installation, and supply of ICA systems. Day-to-day, draw up schedules, allocate time, resources, budget, working with the engineering team, construction team and client to ensure work is completed on time, to a high standard. Strong organizational skills, technical knowledge of electrical systems in a process plant, leadership, strong computer skills, and time management.Manage, expedite, and support consultants' and contractor document submittals, budgets and schedules. Serve as an interface between the ICA Engineering Design team and construction team to facilitate execution of project. Liaise with customers/consultants/project managers concerning approval of plans and drawings, acceptance of work, progress of work, problem solving, etc. Attend site meetings and inspections, report regularly on progress and monitor project schedule. Responsible to handle projects independently Resolve any technical difficulties and other problems that may arise in site or project. Testing and Commissioning of the completed installations with Customers/Consultants/Sub-Contractors Assisted with the development of new ICA engineering standards and maintained and improved existing standards and guidelines. Prepared ICA-related scope documents, exhibits, budgets, specifications, schedules, and Requests for Proposal (RFPs). Coordinated project construction with project and construction managers to resolve critical and time sensitive construction-related ICA issues. Requirements.Degree in Instrumentation, Automation, Mechatronics or its equivalent. Previous experience in ICA projects is crucial. At least 5 years experience as ICA Project Engineer Knowledge of EPC/M work processes as well as familiarity with the various project phases and the scope/deliverables Knowledge of the application, specification, and installation of tagged field instruments Thorough understanding of P&ID symbology and presentation techniques required.

title: Senior Executive / Executive, Corporate Secretariat (Company Secretary)
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Job Summary: This position serves as a Senior Executive/Executive within the Corporate Secretariat Department. The role involves providing corporate secretarial support to a group of companies within the Hong Leong Group, Singapore. The portfolio of companies may include a listed entity such as City Developments Limited (CDL).The support includes ensuring compliance with relevant legislative, regulatory, and listing requirements, as well as maintaining high standards of corporate governance based on best practices. Responsibilities. Handle corporate secretarial work of a group of companies, both listed and unlisted. Organise board and shareholders' meetings. Prepare board papers. Record minutes of meetings. Draft resolutions and announcements. File statutory forms and release announcements to SGX-ST Requirements. ICSA candidates with at least three years of experience in corporate secretarial work. Experience in handling listed companies. Proficiency in ViewPoint, MS Word and Excel. Familiar with corporate secretarial procedures. Resourceful and able to handle varying work assignments. Able to work independently and under time pressure. Corporate secretarial experience in supporting operation in China is advantageous. Good verbal and written communication skills in English are essential

title: Executive, Finance
description: Job Description. The selected individual will be supporting Keppel's Fund Management & Investment Platform. This individual will be stationed at MiWorld in 2023 and will relocate to Keppel Bay Towers in 2024. Assist in the timely closing of accounts and preparation of audit schedules. Assist in preparation of financial schedules, statutory accounts and ensuring quality of accounts meets the agreed service levels. Assist in preparation of month-end journals in accordance with established processes, work procedures and local legal and statutory requirements. Assist in quarterly GST reports preparation, interested/related parties transactions, sponsorship and donation reports. Perform reconciliation of monthly audit schedules, inter-company and bank transactions. Assist in management of fixed assets including disposals and valuations. Handle settlement to fixed assets and maintain fixed asset registers for assigned Companies and Cost Centre groups. Preparation and filing of financial statements in XBRL format. Support external and internal audit, tax reporting and other statutory requirements. Assist to ensure that service is delivered to customers in accordance with pre-defined Service Level Agreements. Liaise and work with Business Units Finance staff and Finance Shared Service Centre colleagues effectively in delivering service level established. Participate in process improvement projects. Ad-hoc tasks assigned by supervisor. Job Requirements. Diploma in Accounting or Business/Finance. Minimum 2 to 3 years of relevant working experience. Strong accounting knowledge and application of Singapore FRS. Displays positive attitude, team player, meticulous and the ability to multi-task and work under tight timelines. Able to work independently and possess good communication skills. Proficient in MS Office applications. Experience working in finance shared services and knowledge of SAP, BPC and ticketing tools would be advantageous

title: Senior Manager, Asst Vice President, Investment
description: Job Summary. City Developments Limited is seeking a talented Senior Manager/Asst Vice President to join us. This position supports the Chief Investment Officer (CIO) primarily in CDL Group local (Singapore) and overseas investments (United Kingdom, UK) and business development related undertakings. Responsibilities. Assist in the formulation of investment and asset management strategies. Responsible for deal sourcing to seek out, identify and execute potential investment and divestment opportunities. Ability to execute deals independently, including: Conduct feasibilities studies and due diligence. Conduct financial modeling and analysis. Prepare investment memos Independently coordinate with internal stakeholders and external professionals in conducting due diligence Structuring Determination of the optimal risk allocation to develop a transaction structure for the project. Support the CIO in establishing effective investment management structure and processes. Ability to conduct in-house valuations, as required. Maintain performance reports to assess up-to-date evaluation of committed investments. Support Group Investments (GI) for compliance-related and risk management matters, ensuring that business processes are conducted within CDL Group framework and guidelines. Assist in the preparation of management presentations for CIO, as required. Requirements. Minimum Bachelor Degree in Real Estate / Finance / Business or related disciplines with minimum 12 years of relevant working experience providing direct support to senior management team. Proven track record in acquisition of development and investments properties in particularly United Kingdom (UK) and Singapore. Possess excellent financial and business acumen, self-motivated and ability to work independently and as a team player. Good understanding of investment operations. Strong organisational and interpersonal skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills

title: AC / VC Support (2 Years Contract)
description: Responsibilities:To support and manage the installation and setup of Video Conference System for the different Business Units in Singtel. To support the setup of Ad-hoc AV VC requirement for Business Units. To ensure the high availability (>90%) and the usability of the Video Conference System within Singtel buildings. To ensure good end user experience for users while using TEAMS, ZOOM or Webex when using Video Conference System To liaise and assist in getting the quotation (VC system, Infra and Property) for the Business Units when they require to setup a new Video Conference System To ensure the setup and commissioning of the Video Conference System is following the current best practices in Singtel. To make periodic health checks on the Video Conference system to ensure the high availability of the system. Tracking of VC assets owned by GIT. To support Top Executive meetings or event when using TEAMS, ZOOM or Webex. To setup iPads for MC and/or Board meetings. Requirements: Minimum ITE in IT related course or equivalent. Minimum 3 years of working experience. Understanding of how Video Conference System works including the backend infra such as Cisco Call Manager. Experience in Troubleshooting and Maintenance of Audio Visual and Video Conference System. Understanding of Network Infra and the ability to do simple trouble shooting. Experience in supporting TEAMS and/or ZOOM meeting and/or events

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Key Responsibilities. Build framework and tools, remove manual operation; improve operational efficiency of the Core Service and Operation pillars. Build onboarding tools to improve operational efficiency of the Operation pillars to successfully onboard thousands of Singtel business applications. Build service and application for Core Service and Operation pillars to handle their daily task and offers service to application team. Build analytic tools for Operation pillar, so that they are able to handle discovery, categorization and remediation of issues within thousands of Singtel Business assets with ease. Improve existing enterprise architecture solution of DevSecOps operations. Evangelize Singtel DevSecOps practice to application team, gain their trust and work together toward common goal Working with other platform service provider teams such as CloudOps, API Gateway, SRE, OCP, HCI team, integrate their operation process into DevSecOps Core Services Eat your own dog food, we develop it, we build it, we run it. Be a team player with other pillars, supporting their daily operational tasks. The ideal candidate must possess. Desire to be a hero, campaigning DevSecOps practice in software engineering battleground. Bachelor degree in a relevant field (i.e. IT, Computer Science or Software Engineering) At least 5 years of professional software development experience, designing and delivery application to productions. Experience with following primary programming languages Java, Python Experience with secondary programming languages Swift, Ruby, Go, Javascript. Understand using and extending build tools such as Gradle, Maven, NPM. Know how to work with REST API, JSON, YAML and data Sound computer science fundamentals including data structures, algorithms, and multithreading. Good oral and written communication skills. Must be proactive, resourceful and self-motivated with strong analytical skills. Experience in software and application development that requires analysis and design work. Must be able to work with limited access to own system (access grant by request, not given) Deliver product through SDLC and Change Management process, even though own team has the privilege access Knowledge/Experience in Continuous Integration and Automated Testing Knowledge/Experience in Agile Development and Management tools. Good to have: Experience working on mobile application development, or web front-end application. Experience working on Atlassian tools integration Experience working with DevOps tools such as Puppet, Ansible, Terraform. Experience in Amazon Web Services, CloudFormation, Kubernetes. Experience in Python Jinjia2 templating modules

title: Development Operation Engineer
description: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES. Automate Docker, OpenShift Container Platform (OCP), GKE and Azure Cloud . Automation using scripting such as Terraform, Python, Linux script, Powershell, Shell script Using DevOps tools such as Jira, Confluence, BitBucket and Nexus Repo. Education and Qualifications.Diploma or Degree [please specify the related qualification required] Work Experience. More than 6 years in Application Development. 5 years in implementation of DevOps for Container and Azure Cloud Platform.Technical / Professional Skills. Knowledge and experience in Azure Cloud and Container Platform. Scripting skill such as Terraform, Python, Linux script, Powershell, Shell script, YAML Good Knowledge of security controls on Azure Cloud. Good knowledge on Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence

title: Food & Beverage Assistant
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Meet, greet and lead guests to their seats. Take customer orders and deliver food and beverages. Clear and remove soiled dishes. Present bills to customer and collect payment from the customer. Arrange table settings and maintain a tidy dining area. Prepare and set-up restaurant for service. Respond promptly to customer inquiries. Undertake any other duties as requested by the Manager. Job Requirements. Team player but also able to work independently. Customer oriented with a pleasant disposition. Able to multi task and thrive in a fast paced environment. Able to work on rotating shifts, weekends and public holiday

title: Chef
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Assisting Senior Chef. Measuring ingredients accurately for Senior Chef(s). Preparation work such as washing, peeling, seasoning and chopping of vegetables and meats. Preparation of basic sauces, as directed by the Senior Chef(s). Receiving of deliveries and verifiying all ordered items are received and stored properly. Taking inventory of supplies and notifiying relevant person(s) when stock is low. Disposal of expired & spoiled food items stored in stock rooms, refrigerators and freezers. Cleaning & ensuring all work stations are organised and sanitised. Kitchen management, procurement of kitchen items & reporting on stock levels of ingredients.Leading and maintaining order of kitchen team during Senior Chef(s) absence. Guiding new/junior kitchen staff members, including but not limited to, line cooking and food preparation. Ensures FIFO food rotation system and verifies all food products are properly dated for quality. Trains new/junior kitchen staff members to kitchen standards. Minimising waste and work with existing systems to improve waste reduction & manage budgetary concerns. Works with Senior Chef(s) to maintain kitchen organisation, staff ability & training opportunities. Ensure food storage units all meet standards & are consistently well-managed and clean

title: Pastry Chef
description: Pastry Chef Responsibilities: Operating and managing the pastry section of the kitchen and liaising with the executive and sous chefs to ensure a successful working environment. Preparing ingredients and handling baking and other kitchen equipment. Creating pastries, baked goods, and confections, by following a set recipe. Developing new recipes for seasonal menus. Decorating pastries and desserts to ensure beautiful and tasteful presentation. Meeting with customers to discuss details and planning of custom-made desserts and pastries for special occasions, such as weddings. Monitoring the stock of baking ingredients. Ordering new supplies, ingredients, and equipment for the pastry section, when needed, and within budget. Ensuring their section of the kitchen adheres to safety and health regulations. Supervising and training staff members, when needed. Pastry Chef Requirements: High school diploma. Post-secondary training at a culinary institution. Certificate in culinary arts, pastry-making, baking, or relevant field. 2 or more yearsâ€™ experience working within the food industry as a Pastry Chef, Baker, or relevant role. Working knowledge of baking techniques and the pastry-making process. Creative ability with artistic skill in decorating cakes and other desserts. Keen attention to detail. In-depth knowledge of sanitation principles, food preparation, and nutrition. Flexible working hours, including weekends and evenings, when necessary. Capable of working in a fast-paced, production environment.

title: Waitress
description: Roles & Responsibilities.Be fully prepared before work and make final check before meals at service partitions. Serve the guests quickly and accurately upon their special requests. Use employee mandate wisely to handle customer defect rates, develop new customers and attract returned customers; relevant information shall be reported to head waiter/waitress. See guests off when they leave and remind them to take their belongings. Keep countertops and floor in service areas clean and sanitary. Customize the needs of guests through careful analysis, collect and report relevant customized information to customer service manager or head waiter/waitress.Complete other tasks assigned by supervisor.

title: Management Trainee
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Learn and be competent in both service and kitchen staff duties. Serve the guests quickly and accurately upon their special requests. Have strong sense of cooperation and safety awareness and always multi-task your errands. Be familiar with the basic work of waiters/waitresses and help them to meet the needs of guests. Ensure that the dishes are properly planed, prepared and stored to guarantee quality. Maintain hygiene, sanitary& cleanliness standards while assisting to enforce security and safety measures on the shifts. Maintain critical standard: holding times, service speed and quality, raw and furnished product quality Follow up on procedures that support market promotions during shifts. Perform any ad-hoc duties as required by the Branch Manager. Requirements. Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in any field. At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Required Skill(s): Microsoft Office. Preferably Junior Executive specialized in Food/Beverage/Restaurant Service or equivalent.

title: Adminstrative Executive, Corporate Accounts (Call Centre / Customer Service)
description: Roles & Responsibilities. The Job. Manage corporate hotline and email address (answer calls and respond to emails).Provide daily account servicing report. Work with cross-functional teams to coordinate pre- and post-account servicing and support resources to drive successful closure and implementation for clients. Identify clients strategic priorities and interests. Handle sensitive information in a confidential manner, The Person. At least 2 years of experience in a call centre environment or customer service role. Able to multi-task and prioritise work. Familiar with MS Office. Bilingual in English and Mandarin to communicate with Mandarin-speaking clients.

title: Adminstrative Assistant
description: Roles & Responsibilities: The administrative assistant serves as the point of contact between management, staff and prospective customers. An administrative assistant is an important person assisting the Clinic Manager, Centre Manager and Academic Head in the daily operation of the clinc dealing with overseas clients mainly from China. Main Duties:Promote ILH courses and address enquiries to prospects or walk-in customers. Ensure the tidiness of the premises before opening the clinic daily. Coordinate with Centre Manager / Marketing Manager for customer registration, entry tests, trial lessons and enrolment paperwork. Coordinate with Clinic on the daily operation. Collect and review quality feedback from patients. Administrative duties including maintaining patients and office records, ordering office supplies, coordinating printer servicing, etc. Perform any other relevant admin duties and responsibilities assigned ad-hoc by the Clinic Manager.

title: Interior designer
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Interior Designer. We are a dynamic and growing interior design firm looking for a talented Interior Designer to join our team. As an Interior Designer, you will be responsible for creating innovative and inspiring designs for a range of clients. If you are passionate about design, a problem solver, and a creative thinker, we would love to hear from you. Responsibilities: Develop and implement innovative interior design concepts for a range of clients. Manage projects from conception to completion, ensuring that designs are delivered on time and within budget. Develop and present design proposals to clients. Conduct site visits to assess existing conditions and provide recommendations for design improvements. Liaise with contractors and other stakeholders to ensure design specifications are met. Qualifications: Diploma in Interior Design or a related field. Minimum of 1 year of work experience as an Interior Designer.Expertise in 3D Max, AutoCAD, Lumion, Sketchup etc. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Benefits. Health insurance. Professional development opportunities. Work Life Balance

title: Senior Interior designer
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Senior Interior Designer Responsibilities: Understand creative direction set by the Design Director/Client and translate it into innovative conceptual design. To plan and propose inspiration interior design ideas/solutions, design developments and space planning to meet clients needs. To work closely with Draughtsman and 3D visualise to translate conceptualise design ideas into drawings. Present 3D perspective drawings to client, and pitch your design decisions. To prepare AutoCAD drawings, floor plans, detailed construction and As-Built Drawings, high quality 3D perspective drawings. Manage design briefs within the constraints of cost and time. Work within stipulated timelines. Responsible for timely delivery of services and solutions with professionalism and quality at all times. To work closely with project team, suppliers, sub-contractors and clients during construction / implementation phase. Prepare project quotations to company prospect clients. Coordinate submission of documents to clients and relevant authorities. Requirements: Diploma or Degree in Interior Design or equivalent. Minimum 3 years of experience in residential, commercial, retail, F&B, office and hospitality design. Proficiency in Autodesk AutoCAD, 3D StudioMax, Photoshop, Sketch up. Possess excellent design flair with a high standard with an eye for details. Strong in design concept & detail drawings. Able to draw furniture layout plan (manual or AutoCAD), concepts, colour rendering. Able to handle projects from design to construction. Good in perspective drawings & space planning. Able to free-hand sketch

title: Interior designer
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Interior Designer. We are a dynamic and growing interior design firm looking for a talented Interior Designer to join our team. As an Interior Designer, you will be responsible for creating innovative and inspiring designs for a range of clients. If you are passionate about design, a problem solver, and a creative thinker, we would love to hear from you. Responsibilities: Develop and implement innovative interior design concepts for a range of clients. Manage projects from conception to completion, ensuring that designs are delivered on time and within budget. Develop and present design proposals to clients. Conduct site visits to assess existing conditions and provide recommendations for design improvements. Liaise with contractors and other stakeholders to ensure design specifications are met. Qualifications: Diploma in Interior Design or a related field. Minimum of 1 year of work experience as an Interior Designer.Expertise in 3D Max, AutoCAD, Lumion, Sketchup etc. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Benefits. Health insurance. Professional development opportunities. Work Life Balance

To plan and propose inspiration interior design ideas/solutions, design developments and space planning to meet clients needs. To work closely with Draughtsman and 3D visualise to translate conceptualise design ideas into drawings. Present 3D perspective drawings to client, and pitch your design decisions. Able to draw furniture layout plan (manual or AutoCAD), concepts, colour rendering. Able to handle projects from design to construction. Good in perspective drawings & space planning. Able to free-hand sketch

title: Educator
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Job Description. EDUCATION OFFICERS (Secondary/Junior College Levels) If you have a professional teaching qualification (such as the Postgraduate Diploma in Education or Diploma in Education from the National Institute of Education) and relevant content knowledge, we welcome you to join us as Education Officer for the following positions: Economics/Business. Management. Theory of Knowledge. Computer Science Mathematics. Science (Biology/Chemistry/Physics). Art & Design. English Language & Literature. Mother Tongue (Chinese Language/Tamil Language). GEP. REQUIREMENTS. Possess relevant teaching qualifications. Experience in teaching the related programmes in local secondary schools/Junior College. Overseas teaching experience may be considered too. Passionate in educating and interacting with student

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Job Description. Responsible to carry out the professional duties of a teacher assistant as circumstances may require and in accordance with the school's policies under the direction of the school Principal. Job Description. Helping to develop programmes of learning activities and adapting appropriate materials. Assist teachers in preparing for lessons by getting materials ready or setting up teaching aids or by preparing lesson plans in advance of classroom activities. Helping students in their daily care needs. Reinforce lessons presented by teachers by reviewing material with students. Enforce school and class rules to help teach students proper behavior Motivating and encouraging pupils Assisting with marking and correcting work and other record keeping Observe and assess the students progress both in and outside the schoolâ€™s curriculum (e.g. grades as well as behavior) Meet and interact with parents as required by the school principal. Attending meetings and reviews as required by the school principal. Helping with the organisation of school events. Job Requirements. Bachelor degree in Education/ Teaching or equivalent, recognised by the CPE/MOE in Singapore. Demonstrate an acute and deep understanding of a primary/ secondary school curriculum; Administrative and organizational skills. Good interpersonal and communication skills Computer literacy in MS Office. Good spoken and written skills in English.

title: Chinese Tuition Teacher
description: Roles & Responsibilities. Urgently Looking for Chinese Tuition Teacher to teach primary school and secondary school level. Diploma / A level holder (or equivalent). Experienced Required. Able to conduct lessons professionally. Able to work independently. Able to work on 2 shifts. Willing to work on weekends. Friendly, approachable, caring and understanding attitude
